title: Geekbench accuses Samsung of benchmark manipulation, delists last four years of Galaxy flagships
content:
The Samsung Galaxy S22 series is clearly a hit, with pre-order sales through the roof. However, that hasn’t stopped it from facing its own set of controversies. The most recent of which surrounds the company’s Game Optimization Service, which reportedly throttles approximately 10,000 applications. Samsung has since said that it will give users the choice

The post Geekbench accuses Samsung of benchmark manipulation, delists last four years of Galaxy flagships appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Geekbench has accused Samsung of benchmark manipulation, delisting the last four years of Galaxy series flagships from its benchmark browser.
